message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. My initial offer is $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1050000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not convinced that $1050000 is the best price. I'm willing to offer $980000, which is closer to my target price. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $980000. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer $1030000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not convinced that $1030000 is the best price. I'm willing to offer $990000, which is a bit closer to my target price. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
